name: Air Drone Attack: Strike the Illicit Hideouts
name_original: Air Drone Attack: Strike the Illicit Hideouts
description: You will be an officer of the largest, most powerful navy in the world, with the highest combined battle fleet tonnage. Air skirmish drone simulator: shooting assailant is almost as realistic as flying a military drone in real life. The only difference is that you don’t need to bring your remote control before taking flight. Air skirmish drone simulator: shooting assailant has many cool and challenging different game levels that will keep you entertained for many hours. In these military drone games the gameplay will get a little bit more challenging after you completed the previous level. The more levels you finish the more challenging these military drone game levels will become. Do you have the skills to complete all army drone game levels!!!
